description: This file defines the ApiError class, representing a standard error payload for API responses, including timestamp, error code, message, and optional details.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: A class that encapsulates error information for API responses, including timestamp, code, message, and additional details.

methods.name: ApiError
methods.description: Constructor that initializes an ApiError instance with specified code, message, and details.

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the error was created.

methods.name: getDetails
methods.description: Returns additional details about the error.
